pageProduct.name: Avene Cleanance Women Corrective Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Eau Thermale Avène Cleanance WOMEN Corrective Serum helps to reduce blemishes, refine skin texture and reduce the appearance of pores, thanks to a unique combination of active ingredients:
• Glycolic/Lactic Acids: refine the skin texture.
• Synovea: helps to reduce blemishes and limit sebum oxidation, anti-blemish and antioxidant active ingredient.
• P-Refinyl: mattifying, tightens pores.

48% reduction of blemishes*

*Tolerance and efficacy study carried out under dermatological and ophthalmological control on 31 women for 57 days with 2 applications per day

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). WATER (AQUA). GLYCOLIC ACID. GLYCERIN. POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE. PROPLENE GLYCOL. HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE. LACTIC ACID. SODIUM CHLORIDE. HEXYLRESORCINOL. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). LENS ESCULENTA (LENTIL) SEED EXTRACT (LENS ESCULENTA SEED EXTRACT). PENTYLENE GLYCOL. POLYACRYLATE-13. POLYISOBUTENE. POLYSORBATE 20. POLYSORBATTE 60. SODIUM BENZOATE SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE.
